title: Is USPS Purposefully Slowing Mail To Help Reelect Trump?
subtitle: U.S. Postal Service workers nationwide reported backlogs of letters and packages in summer 2020. But was the issue political?
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: U.S. Postmaster General Louis DeJoy, a political ally to U.S. President Donald Trump, ordered Postal Service carriers to "slow the mail down" to help Trump win the 2020 presidential election.
